headline.print_headline: New Allegations of Corruption in 2022 Cup Vote
headline.main: New Allegations of Corruption in 2022 Cup Vote

lead_paragraph: FIFA's decision to award the 2022 World Cup to Qatar came under further scrutiny as a British newspaper published new allegations that Mohamed Bin Hammam used his wealth and top level contacts to buy support for the oil-rich country's successful bid.
